page.title: 10ANTHROPOSOPHY
page.content: { Anthroposophy}is the teaching prescribed by {Rudolf Steiner}(1861- 1925)who was born in the Austro-Hungarian Empire. The teaching covers the cultural,social and economic as well as the spiritual development of the individual.The base of the Anthroposophical Society is in Switzerland and the movement is world wide with schools and cultural institutions in many countries. The Anthroposophical Society of Great Britain and also {Michael Hall}School were founded in 1925. After the second World War the school moved to {Forest {Row.}Since that time Anthroposophical institutions and activities have grown considerably in the Forest Row area. These include the school itself several schools for the maladjusted children and {Emerson College }for Adult Education.
